mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_code roleCode FROM sys_role a INNER JOIN sys_user_role b ON a.id = b.role_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.active = 1

SELECT a.permissions FROM sys_menu a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role c ON b.role_id = c.role_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND a.permissions IS NOT NULL AND a.permissions != '' AND c.user_id = 1 AND a.active = 1
